name: Deliver More!!! - VimJam2
description:
You got hired to work on the delivery warehouse of Omazone. Control the crane to deliver the right packages as quickly as you can.

Your boss Joff is watching and is very impatient, so the more you'll deliver, the happier Joff will be.

Base controls are:

  • LEFT ARROW to move the crane to the left
  • RIGHT ARROW to move the crane to the right
  • SPACE BAR to grab a package with the crane
  • DOWN ARROW to release/drop a package
  • F to deliver the packages you collected
  • ESCAPE to open/close the pause menu while playing

Nb: controls can be changed to QWERTY, AZERTY or ARROWS anytime ingame.

Softwares used:

  • Game made with Unity
  • Art made with Aseprite
  • Sound made with BFXR
  • Music made with JummBox (modified version of BeepBox)
  • Game's app logo made with Inkscape

Credits:

  • Game done solo by ShidyGames during the VimJam2, in less than 10 days.
  • Special thanks to Vimlark, Joshua McLean & 8 Bits To Infinity for the jam!
  • Ingame font is Silkscreen, made by Jason Aleksandr Kottke.
